name: KRAVEROCK
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crave rock
des:
"Krave Rock is a recognized hard rock radio station digitally broadcasting worldwide from Dallas, Texas.

At Krave Rock, we believe that rock music should be powerful, uncompromising, and unapologetic. Our curated playlists feature the biggest names in rock like Breaking Benjamin, Disturbed, Nothing More, In This Moment, Shinedown, Falling In Reverse, Godsmack, Asking Alexandria, I Prevail, Bad Omens, and much more!  

Since our beginning in 2011, we have featured up-and-coming artists who push the boundaries of the genre to keep the spirit of rock alive. We have been among the first radio stations to play bands like Kingdom Collapse, Saul, Anything But Human, Eva Under Fire, Messer, Any Given Sin, and Silent Theory, as well many others. 

Join us on social media and connect with other rock fans from around the world, share your favorite bands or songs, win prizes, laugh with us, & stay up-to-date on the latest news and events in the rock world."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
